name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right Click Search Google in New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a right click menu option to search for the selected text on Google in a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an option to search selected text on Google in a new tab (as per the old default behaviour when right clicking on selected text).
